Biology

Yi Lin is now a PhD candidate at the Department of Computer Science and Engineering (CSE), Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST), under the supervision of Prof. Kwang-Ting (Tim) Cheng and Prof. Hao Chen. Before that, he was a research engineer in Jarvis Lab at Tencent under the supervision of Dr. Yefeng Zheng and Dr. Kai Ma. He received his M.S. degree and B.S. degree from Huazhong University of Science and Technology (HUST) in 2020 and 2012 respectively, under the supervision of Prof. Xin Yang. His research interests include medical image analysis and deep learning.
